column5: Here are a couple clips from this past weekend on Rice Lake. Both clips taken with my GoPro Hero 2 camera's.  Topwater Bassin - GoPro Style! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w0mCTybe-CU  Drive by! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_UrTSDUm_9w  Another video added!
Cool! When I was there thursday ( two days before opener   ) they were a love'n my cranks!

Nice videos! I can see the 2nd video being a part of a great tittle intro. GoPro has pretty bad audio capture system, I'm considering a separate recorder in my pocket for audio signals on my next outing, and sync it back to the video after. You'll hear the hooksets, braidline through the guides and water splashing!
sweet video, those go pro cameras are pretty sweet, nice fish too!
